Package org.jungrapht.visualization.transform.shape

Interface ShapeTransformer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BidirectionalTransformer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiLayerTransformer, MutableTransformer, ShapeFlatnessTransformer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineTransformer, DefaultTransformer, HyperbolicShapeTransformer, HyperbolicTransformer, LensTransformer, LensTransformSupport, MagnifyShapeTransformer, MagnifyTransformer, MutableAffineTransformer, MutableTransformerDecorator, TransformSupport
    public interface ShapeTransformer
extends BidirectionalTransformer
    Provides methods to map points from one coordinate system to another: graph to screen and screen to graph.
    Author:
    Tom Nelson

        Shape transform​(Shape shape)
        map a shape from graph coordinate system to the screen coordinate system
